name: Countdown (itch) (The Pamps Games)
description:
MADE FOR WEEKLY GAME JAM 63. 

In Countdown, your only goal is to survive, and time is running out!

A, D and Spacebar to move, ESC to pause.

The crimson is falling from the sky, it will rip your time on this Earth from you like candy from a baby, avoid it at all costs! To regain your Time-Points™ you must collect blue Time Crystals™ falling from the sky-chasm above.

F U N

R E L E N T L E S S

O R I G I N A L

G A M E P L A Y
